description:
with devstack, I created a new network and tried to use it to nova boot an instance, but failed:
nova-manage network create private1 7.7.7.0/24
nova boot --image 8f3a5413-045c-4556-8d5c-3ce82968e312 --flavor 1 --nic net-id=23a03e62-5455-4e03-896e-60c45cb16bc8 mysever
ERROR: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)
title: failed to nova boot with fresh new network

comments.content:
with devstack, I created a new network and tried to use it to nova boot an instance, but failed:
nova-manage network create private1 7.7.7.0/24
nova boot --image 8f3a5413-045c-4556-8d5c-3ce82968e312 --flavor 1 --nic net-id=23a03e62-5455-4e03-896e-60c45cb16bc8 mysever
ERROR: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gongysh

comments.content:
if this is still reproducible, could you attach any errors seen in the api, compute or network logs?

Also, please say what exact version you're using

I assume this is using an admin user so it's a different issue from bug #990848 ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content: We cannot solve the issue you reported without more information. Could you please provide the requested information ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it, therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and set the bug status back to ''New''.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
